title: Mariné by TipoType
content:
**Hello Typophiles!**  
--------------------------------------------------  
We are proud to announce our new release!  
--------------------------------------------------

[**'Mariné'** by Martin Sommaruga](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414190738/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/marine/?refby=tipotype), with a release offer of 77% OFF!!!

If you'd like to **support the type designers** please purchase directly at [**TipoType.com (Mariné)**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414190738/http:/tipotype.com/marine/) where the designer gets 80% of every sale.
